name: sfchronicle
text:
The searing heat and humidity, rain, thunder and lightning thrashing California could be the beginning of the end of the region’s dry Mediterranean climate and a prelude of more surprises to come, scientists say.

via @pfimrite: https://t.co/g0iq9Xv4KG

name: sfchronicle
text:
Adam Schiff, Val Demings and Hakim Jeffries were Democratic stars during President Trump’s impeachment trial. But none will be speaking in prime time at the #DemConvention, a sign the party doesn’t want to revisit that episode.

via @JoeGarofoli: https://t.co/7Td5BQrkFW
